# UI Recommendations for GP Solutions Pro

*Generated by Kimi - 2026-02-04*

## Design System

### Color Palette
- **Primary:** Teal (professional, modern)
- **Neutrals:** Richer tones for depth

### Typography
- **Font Family:** Inter (professional look)
- **Consistent hierarchy**

### Spacing & Styling
- Consistent spacing scale
- Unified shadows
- Standard border-radius values

---

## Component Improvements

### Cards
- Hover lift effect
- Status indicators
- Gradient borders for emphasis

### Buttons
5 variants:
1. Primary
2. Secondary
3. Ghost
4. Destructive
5. Icon-only

All with loading states.

### Tables
- Row hover actions
- Sortable headers
- Mobile card transform (responsive)

### Badges
- Color-coded status badges
- Consistent sizing

---

## Dashboard Upgrades

### KPI Cards
- Sparkline charts
- Trend indicators (up/down arrows with %)

### New Widgets
- Live dispatch board
- Revenue chart
- Timeline view
- Activity feed

---

## Navigation

### Sidebar
- Collapsible (icon-only mode)
- Badge counts on nav items
- Active state indicators

### Mobile
- Bottom navigation bar
- FAB (Floating Action Button) for primary action

---

## Page-Specific Improvements

### Schedule
- Drag-drop calendar
- Day/week/month views
- Visual job type indicators

### Jobs
- Kanban board view
- Stages: Lead → Quote → Scheduled → Complete → Paid
- Drag between columns

### Route Optimization
- Make it visually stunning (key differentiator!)
- Animated route drawing
- Driver avatars on map

---

## Mobile Experience

- Bottom navigation bar
- Swipe actions on list items
- 44px minimum touch targets
- Optimized forms

---

## Implementation Priority (6 Weeks)

### Phase 1: Design System Foundation (Week 1)
- [ ] Define color tokens
- [ ] Typography scale
- [ ] Spacing scale
- [ ] Core components: Button, Card, Badge, Input

### Phase 2: Dashboard Polish (Week 2)
- [ ] KPI cards with sparklines
- [ ] Activity feed widget
- [ ] Revenue chart

### Phase 3: Page Improvements (Weeks 3-4)
- [ ] Schedule: Calendar views
- [ ] Jobs: Kanban board
- [ ] Tables: Sortable + mobile transform

### Phase 4: Mobile Experience (Week 5)
- [ ] Bottom navigation
- [ ] Swipe actions
- [ ] Touch target audit

### Phase 5: Micro-interactions & Accessibility (Week 6)
- [ ] Hover/focus states
- [ ] Loading skeletons
- [ ] ARIA labels
- [ ] Keyboard navigation

---

## Recommended Libraries

```bash
npm install framer-motion recharts @dnd-kit/core @dnd-kit/sortable
```

- **framer-motion** - Animations and transitions
- **recharts** - Charts and sparklines
- **@dnd-kit** - Drag and drop (calendar, kanban)
